job_description:
• Currently pursuing a Bachelor's, or Master's, degree in computer science or related field.
• Communication with internal stakeholders and a diverse worldwide IT team to create solutions that fit customer needs and add value to the business Strong programming concepts with knowledge of object-oriented programming and languages like C#, Python etc.
• Outstanding analytical thinking, interpersonal and written communication skills.
• Cannot graduate prior to September 2026.
• Ability to prioritize and meet critical project timelines in a fast-paced environment.
• Knowledge of web frontend technologies like JavaScript, react etc.
• Ability to learn new concepts, programming languages on the fly.
• Strong conceptual knowledge in data structure & algorithms.

• BS in Computer Science/Engineering or related field, or 1-2 years of IT support or semiconductor operations experience.
• Excellent written, verbal, and cross-cultural communication skills.
• Observability EngineerHyderabad, Telangana, IndiaPosted a month ago Develop permanent software solutions for critical business needs.
• Professional team environment and customer support experience.
• Background in manufacturing tracking systems or processes.
• Working knowledge of: C#, Perl, Bash, Visual Basic (.
• NET), SQL, XML, Linux, Unix, Windows, Python, PowerShell, HTML Create and maintain KPIs and ITSI monitoring solutions.
• Splunk knowledge a plus.
